channel.title: Fear on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Fear on Praveen Lobo

item.title: What Was My Skydiving All About?
item.description: Ever since I posted my skydiving post/video and dedicated it to the people fighting against corruption, some of my friends have been teasing me about it. I did what I wanted to and have no regrets. I have been able to shut them up with just asking if they have the balls to do it before talking smack! I can take a good tease but the attitude of getting things done quickly and avoiding lines even if it means paying bribe irks me to the core.

item.title: Last Day at the Dance Class
item.description: A little sadness has taken over me. Today was my last day at Dance Verve. Remember this last paragraph? A week after that I joined Dance Verve at BTM Check Post. I remember the very first day - I entered the class when Taj Khan (we call him sir) was not yet in. I talked to two guys (now I know them - Pavan and Manas) and sir arrived in about 15 minutes.
